summary: Both headers were updated to use theme-aware monochrome logo assets with the specified src/alt strings and 80px height with auto width. Additional unrelated UI/behavior changes appear to have been introduced in header components beyond the logo swap.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed user greeting to include a waving hand emoji.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to swap logo assets and set size/alt text; greeting content was not part of requirements or acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded marketing header region/language preference state, localStorage persistence, and dispatch of custom events (regionChange/languageChange).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update the marketing header logo assets, sizing, and alt text; region/language selection behavior was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed theme toggle behavior to explicitly toggle based on resolvedTheme (system-aware) instead of existing logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: While related to theme handling, the BuildRequest explicitly scoped changes to selecting the correct logo for already-existing theme resolution and did not request altering theme toggle behavior.
